data.name: Earth Attack
data.detailed_description:
Tragedy strikes as aliens attack Earth. You're left alone to pilot the last remaining spacecraft on its way back to Earth from Mars Colony. Avoid missiles, asteroids, enemy ships, and more as you accumulate high-scores in the arcade game Earth Attack. Use WASD or the Arrow Keys to move. Spacebar or Left Mouse Click to fire missiles and destroy asteroids; triumph over obstacles and enemies alike to save Earth!

Features:
  • Replayable Endless Arcade-Style Gameplay Loop
  • Space
  • Alien Ships
  • Avoid Obstacles
  • Fight Back By Firing Missiles
  • Asteroids
  • Score Attack

Thanks to Markiplier for being the first person to ever try the game out and provide some feedback! We are working on updates that will include boss battles, more events, and an improved gameplay loop thanks to his suggestions in his video titled "I Let a Sketchy Website Pick a Random Steam Game for Me to Play" so check that out if you're interested to laugh at our mistakes! Hopefully, we can improve Earth Attack to be worthy of his glorious positive review!!

data.short_description: Tragedy strikes as aliens attack Earth. You're left alone to pilot the last remaining spacecraft on its way back to Earth from Mars Colony. Avoid missiles, asteroids, enemy ships, and more as you accumulate high-scores in Earth Attack! Can you survive long enough or will you perish?
data.reviews:
“I Let a Sketchy Website Pick a Random Steam Game for Me to Play”
10 – Markiplier

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with Dedicated Memory
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64-Bit version of Windows Required

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
